mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 5-5, upper shelf|front edge
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Jenny [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: All written upside down. (Note: photographers always began on the left side of the upper and lower shelves when taking pictures, moving left to right, so I do not think the photograph is just upside down.) [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Shattered Shattered | Bite the BIG APPLE
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: New York (N.Y.)
